# Open science + data

Feel free to play around with the data or models. Issues or questions can be discussed on each of the GitHub Issue pages.

## @Lai2021a: `novelforestSG`---diversity, abiotic factors and `brms` model

- Install from [CRAN](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/novelforestSG/index.html)
- Detailed instructions on [GitHub](https://github.com/hrlai/novelforestSG) or [GitHub Pages](https://hrlai.github.io/novelforestSG/)
- Our paper in [*Applied Vegetation Science*](https://doi/10.1111/avsc.12548)

## @Lai2020: fourth-corner joint species distribution model using `boral`

- Download from [GitHub](https://github.com/hrlai/Lai_et_al_2020_JEcol_Trait_Env)
- Our paper in [*Journal of Ecology*](https://doi.org/10.1111/1365-2745.13347)

## @Song2020: `allometree`---an `R` package for urban tree size allometry

- Download from [GitHub](https://github.com/xp-song/allometree)
